CHAT.comment: Dear daddy I am trying to be a good boy at home and in school. I miss you very much. I can't wait to see you. love Chi

MOT decides that Chi will write to his dad. Chi is a competent writer and could probably compose his own letter , but Mot directs him from beginning to end. Mot digresses for long periods about Chi's poor penmanship and spelling and about a friend. She comes across as unnecessarily critical of Chi who does a great job. Nevertheless it seems clear that Mot is concerned about Chi's performance and success.

u.a: MOT shows EXP letter Chi has written in school
Chi erases what he has written and writes <I am>
mouths letters as he writes them

CHAT.comment: EXP explains to Mot that her payment check will take a few weeks to process. Then Mot takes the conversation on a long tangent by talking about a mutual acquaintance of EXP and herself. For excerpt see RICLW5.MIS.

u.a: yells at little Bro to go into her , turn on the tv , and not to touch anything on her dresser
wait is spelled correctly in end product
